title: Account Director
content:
At AKQA we believe in the imaginative application of art and science to create beautiful ideas, products and services. With an entrepreneurial and collaborative approach, we design adaptive digital services and applications that capture the imagination, delivering impressive returns for our clients.
At AKQA we believe in the imaginative application of art and science to create beautiful ideas, products and services. With an entrepreneurial and collaborative approach, we design adaptive digital services and applications that capture the imagination, delivering impressive returns for our clients.
The AKQA Commercial team serves as a trusted and respected partner to our clients. As the little details are the detail, the AKQA Commercial team show industry leading professionalism at every touch, meeting, call, or message.  We partner with our clients to create a better future, through world-leading work, constant innovation and care.
The successful candidate's main responsibility will be to work closely with the Commercial/Operations team to ensure smooth workflow of projects and liaise directly with clients during projects
Located in Johannesburg, South Africa, as part of AKQA TMARC, South Africa’s leading performance marketing company, building products and services that are driven by data, content, and media, you will work in an environment that fosters a dynamic and meritocratic culture, and service clients across the globe.
ROLE REQUIREMENTS

Manage all project-related documentation
Run medium to large projects independently, at times, of management
Project manage various disciplines internally within the various departments and third partyresources through good planning, tracking and controlling
Be client facing alongside the Commercial team and build solid relationships with clients
Office administration around projects to ensure all documentation is completed and secure.
Keeping management informed on status of all projects running across the company
Finding efficient solutions to work flow and client issues.

QUALITIES AND EXPERIENCE

Experience in the online/mobile environment
Ability to demonstrate solution thinking
Experience of customer service/project management within the online/mobile/agency environment.
Experience in managing projects/teams
Experience in dealing with clients (brand managers, marketing managers)
Good managerial and interpersonal skills
Ability to manage/motivate resources to ensure work delivery
Proactive problem solving capability
PC literacy (MS Office: MS Excel, MS Outlook, MS Word and MS PowerPoint)
High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills

 
AKQA is an Equal Opportunities Employer, we believe that diversity is vital to AKQA’s ability to provide our clients with the best recommendations and are committed to fostering a varied and inclusive work environment. Your race, colour, ancestry, religion, gender, gender identity, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability or veteran status have no bearing on our hiring decisions. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.
